poem:
In The Light of Lyrics

Born amid Stafford's whispers, raised under Glasgow skies,  
Art school dreams wove into melodies and chords,  
Glass Onion peeled to reveal Travis,  
In songs, the world found its heartbreaks and hopes.  
A voice echoing past borders—more than an album,  
More than a name—journeyed into the soul of sound.
